missions.name: Equipment Inspection

objectives.description: All equipment fits in one launch area under height limit

choices.description: All equipment fits in one launch area under height limit

missions.description: Robot and all equipment must fit completely in one launch area under 12 in. (305 mm) height limit

missions.name: 01: Coral Nursery

objectives.description: Coral tree is hanging on the coral tree support

choices.description: Coral tree is hanging on the coral tree support

objectives.description: Bonus: Bottom of coral tree is in its holder

choices.description: Bonus: Bottom of coral tree is in its holder

objectives.description: Coral buds are flipped up

choices.description: Coral buds are flipped up

missions.description: Secure new coral structures to grow in the nursery until they are strong enough for transport to the reef

missions.name: 02: Shark

objectives.description: Shark is no longer touching the cave

choices.description: Shark is no longer touching the cave

objectives.description: Shark is touching the mat and at least partly in the shark habitat

choices.description: Shark is touching the mat and at least partly in the shark habitat

missions.description: The shark was just tagged for research - release it back into its habitat

missions.name: 03: Coral Reef

objectives.description: Coral reef is flipped up, not touching the mat

choices.description: Coral reef is flipped up, not touching the mat

objectives.description: Reef segment is standing upright, outside of home, and touching the mat

choices.description: Reef segment is standing upright, outside of home, and touching the mat

missions.description: Carefully mount the new coral structure without damaging other nearby reef segments

missions.name: 04: Scuba Diver

objectives.description: Scuba diver is no longer touching the coral nursery

choices.description: Scuba diver is no longer touching the coral nursery

objectives.description: Scuba diver is hanging on the coral reef support

choices.description: Scuba diver is hanging on the coral reef support

missions.description: Help the scuba diver transport new coral from the nursery to the reef

missions.name: 05: Angler Fish

objectives.description: Angler fish is latched within the shipwreck

choices.description: Angler fish is latched within the shipwreck

missions.description: Guide the angler fish back to its unexpected home within the shipwreck

missions.name: 06: Raise the Mast

objectives.description: Shipwreck's mast is completely raised

choices.description: Shipwreck's mast is completely raised

missions.description: Raise the mast to restore the sunken shipwreck and explore what is inside

missions.name: 07: Kraken's Treasure

objectives.description: Treasure chest is completely outside the kraken's nest

choices.description: Treasure chest is completely outside the kraken's nest

missions.description: Retrieve the chest from the shipwreck to reveal the history and treasure it holds

missions.name: 08: Artificial Habitat

objectives.description: Artificial habitat stack segment is completely flat and upright

choices.description: Artificial habitat stack segment is completely flat and upright

missions.description: Rearrange the artificial habitat stacks to create safe homes for the crabs and other sea creatures

missions.name: 09: Unexpected Encounter

objectives.description: Unknown creature is released

choices.description: Unknown creature is released

objectives.description: Unknown creature is at least partly in the cold seep

choices.description: Unknown creature is at least partly in the cold seep

missions.description: An unknown creature has attached itself to the AUV! Safely release it and deliver it to the cold seep

missions.name: 10: Send over the Submersible

objectives.description: Your team's yellow flag is down

choices.description: Your team's yellow flag is down

objectives.description: Submersible is clearly closer to the opposing field

choices.description: Submersible is clearly closer to the opposing field

missions.description: Some waters are too difficult to reach with larger ships. Send the submersible to explore the opposing field's waters

missions.name: 11: Sonar Discovery

objectives.description: One whale is revealed

choices.description: One whale is revealed

objectives.description: Bonus: Both whales are revealed

choices.description: Bonus: Both whales are revealed

missions.description: Use the ship's sonar technology to scan the surroundings for nearby objects or animals

missions.name: 12: Feed the Whale

objectives.description: Krill at least partly in the whale's mouth

choices.description: Krill at least partly in the whale's mouth

missions.description: Krill are a whale's favorite food! Collect the krill and feed them to the hungry whale

missions.name: 13: Change Shipping Lanes

objectives.description: Ship is in the new shipping lane, touching the mat

choices.description: Ship is in the new shipping lane, touching the mat

missions.description: Adjust the cargo ship's route to safely avoid whale migration routes by moving to another shipping lane

missions.name: 14: Sample Collection

objectives.description: Water sample is completely outside the water sample area

choices.description: Water sample is completely outside the water sample area

objectives.description: Seabed sample is no longer touching the seabed

choices.description: Seabed sample is no longer touching the seabed

objectives.description: Plankton sample is no longer touching the kelp forest

choices.description: Plankton sample is no longer touching the kelp forest

objectives.description: Trident piece is no longer touching the shipwreck

choices.description: Trident piece is no longer touching the shipwreck

objectives.description: Bonus: Both trident pieces are no longer touching the shipwreck

choices.description: Bonus: Both trident pieces are no longer touching the shipwreck

missions.description: Collect samples and artifacts from around the mat so they can be analyzed by scientists in the lab

missions.name: 15: Research Vessel

objectives.description: Sample(s) at least partly in the research vessel's cargo area

choices.description: Sample(s) at least partly in the research vessel's cargo area

objectives.description: Trident part(s) at least partly in the research vessel's cargo area

choices.description: Trident part(s) at least partly in the research vessel's cargo area

objectives.description: Treasure chest at least partly in the research vessel's cargo area

choices.description: Treasure chest at least partly in the research vessel's cargo area

objectives.description: Port's latch is at least partly in the research vessel's loop

choices.description: Port's latch is at least partly in the research vessel's loop

missions.description: Securely dock the ship that contains the samples and artifacts your team has collected

missions.name: Precision Tokens

objectives.description: Choose how many precision tokens remain

choices.description: 6 precision tokens remaining
5 precision tokens remaining
4 precision tokens remaining

2 precision tokens remaining
1 precision token remaining

missions.description: You begin with six precision tokens worth 50 points. Lose one for each interruption outside home
